name: wakoopa widget
author: Keith 'afex' Thornhill

sections.description:
wakoopa is a social website centered around sharing what software you use. This widget displays the software you use in either image or plain text form.

Use this widget if you don’t want to edit your theme manually in order to include your wakoopa badge on your blog.
sections.installation:
1. Upload wakoopa.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add the widget to your theme via the Design -> Widgets screen
  4. Be sure to input your wakoopa username into the settings for the widget

short_description: The wakoopa widget allows you to easily show your readers what software you frequently use via the wakoopa service.
description:
